A pioneer in HDPE network, specialized in fittings for HDPE networks: Welding Machines, Tools, Accessories... etc. HDPE PIPE SDR11, SDR17, SDR26, electrofusion fittings, butt welding fittings, socket fusion fittings, compression fittings, drainage fitting, PVC fitting.

our_branches.title: Our Branches
our_branches.description: We offer a wide range of products and services at all our branches. Visit us today!

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: We are a leading company in the field of agricultural irrigation, providing a wide range of products and services to meet our customers' needs. We are committed to delivering the highest levels of quality and innovation in everything we do.
about_us.vision_description: To be the leading company in agricultural irrigation in the region, focusing on innovation and quality.
about_us.mission_description: To provide innovative and effective irrigation solutions that meet our customers' needs and contribute to improving agricultural productivity.
about_us.seo_description: We are a leading company in the field of agricultural irrigation, providing a wide range of products and services to meet our customers' needs. We are committed to delivering the highest levels of quality and innovation in everything we do.

about.title: About IWACO
about.subtitle: A pioneer in water network technology with a global presence | Saudia Arabia
about.intro1: IWACO is the Middle East market leader in water networks technology with a global presence. Since its establishment, the company has consistently set new trends with comprehensive system solutions.
about.intro2: Innovative ideas, dedicated employees, and elaborate working processes make IWACO a pioneer in the Middle East. We are committed to using natural resources responsibly to protect the environment

services.title: Our Services
services.description1: IWACO specializes in water supply systems, drainage networks, HDPE piping, fittings, geomembranes, and chemical isolation sheets for buildings, lakes, tanks, and more—serving both public and private sectors.
services.description2: We manage a wide range of projects with expert methods in
services.description3: Supply, Design, Installation, Finishing, and Testing

coreValues.title: Our Core Values
coreValues.excellence_description: Excellence in all aspects, from reputation to performance.
coreValues.quality_description: Premium solutions and services across the board.
coreValues.innovation_description: Leading industry practices and continuously pioneering new solutions.
coreValues.respect_description: Prioritizing our customers, vendors, and employees in every decision.

cta.title: Want to learn more or get a quote?
cta.description: Contact us today for more information or to request a personalized quote.
